config.useAIOrchestrator.description: Enable AI intelligent tool orchestrator (new architecture)
config.fallbackModels.description: Language model fallback priority list (top to bottom). When the selected model is unavailable, these models are tried in order; empty uses VS Code provider's model list order.
config.tavilyApiKey.markdownDescription:
[Deprecated] Tavily AI Search API key (recommended for international users).

**How to obtain**:
1. Visit https://tavily.com
2. Register and get a free API key
3. Enter the key here

**Note**: Takes effect immediately, no restart required.
config.bingApiKey.description: [Deprecated] Bing Search API key (requires Azure account)
config.bingApiKey.markdownDescription:
[Deprecated] Microsoft Bing Search API key (Azure Cognitive Services).

**How to obtain**:
1. Visit https://azure.microsoft.com/services/cognitive-services/bing-web-search-api/
2. Create an Azure account and subscribe to Bing Search API
3. Get the Subscription Key
4. Enter the key here

**Note**: Requires a valid Azure subscription.
config.baiduApiKey.markdownDescription:
[Deprecated] Baidu AI Search API key (recommended for users in mainland China).

**How to obtain**:
1. Visit https://ai.baidu.com/ai-doc/SEARCH/
2. Register a Baidu account and create an application
3. Get the API Key and Secret Key
4. Enter the API Key here, Secret Key in the field below

**Note**: Both API Key and Secret Key are required.
config.baiduSecretKey.markdownDescriptio:
Baidu AI Search Service Secret Key.

**Security tips**:
- This is sensitive information, keep it safe
- Do not share this key in public places
- Must be used together with API Key
config.schemaPath.description: Requirement entity schema file path configuration
config.excludeDirectories.description: Directories to exclude when switching projects
config.excludeDirectories.markdownDescri:
Directory names to exclude in the project switching feature. These directories will not appear in the project selection list.

**Default exclusions**:
- `templates` - User template directory
- `knowledge` - Knowledge base directory
- `node_modules` - Node.js dependencies
- `.git` - Git repository
- `.vscode` - VSCode configuration
- `coverage` - Test coverage reports
- `dist` - Build output
- `build` - Build output
config.rag.enabled.description: Enable enterprise RAG knowledge base retrieval
config.rag.enabled.markdownDescription:
Enable enterprise RAG knowledge base retrieval.

Once enabled, AI can access your enterprise knowledge base via the `customRAGRetrieval` tool.

**Note**: Server address and authentication must also be configured.
config.rag.baseUrl.markdownDescription:
Base URL of the enterprise RAG server.

**Examples**:
- `http://192.168.1.100:8080`
- `https://rag.company.com`

**Note**: Ensure the URL is accessible from VS Code's network environment.
config.rag.appKey.markdownDescription:
Application key for the enterprise RAG system.

**Security tips**:
- Ensure the key's security
- Do not share this key in public places
- Recommend rotating keys regularly
config.rag.appSecret.markdownDescription:
Application secret for the enterprise RAG system.

**Security tips**:
- This is sensitive information, keep it safe
- Do not commit this configuration to version control
- Recommend rotating secrets regularly
config.rag.defaultDatasetId.markdownDesc:
Default dataset ID for the enterprise RAG system.

**Description**:
- When AI calls RAG retrieval without specifying a dataset ID, this default value will be used
- Can be overridden by parameters in specific calls
- Ensure this dataset ID exists in your RAG system
config.mcp.excludeKeywords.description: Exclude MCP tools containing these keywords
config.mcp.excludeKeywords.markdownDescr:
Exclude MCP tools containing these keywords (case-insensitive).

**How to use**:
1. View all registered MCP tools in Control Panel
2. Add keywords (e.g., `java_app_mode`, `appmod`) to exclude related tools
3. Tools with names containing these keywords will not be registered

**Examples**:
- Add `java_app_mode` to exclude all GitHub Copilot Java-related tools
- Add `appmod` to exclude application modernization tools

**Note**: Window reload required after configuration changes.
config.syntaxChecker.enabled.markdownDes: Enable syntax-checker tool for Markdown and YAML file syntax checking.
config.syntaxChecker.markdown.mode.markd:
Select Markdown checking mode:

- **all**: Execute all markdownlint checks
- **standard**: Execute necessary checks (recommended)
- **no**: Disable all markdownlint checks
- **custom**: Custom mode, use custom rules configuration below
config.syntaxChecker.markdown.customRule: Custom rules configuration (only used in Custom mode)

Configure specific markdownlint rules when Custom mode is selected.

**How to use**:
1. Set Mode above to 'custom'
2. Configure specific rules here

**Example configuration**:
```json
{
  "MD001": true,
  "MD007": { "indent": 4 },
  "MD033": { "allowed_elements": ["br", "details", "summary"] }
}
```

**Rule references**:
[View full markdownlint rules documentation](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/blob/main/doc/Rules.md)
config.syntaxChecker.yaml.level.markdown:
Select YAML checking level:

- **basic**: Check basic syntax errors only
- **standard**: Check syntax + basic structure issues (recommended)
- **strict**: Check syntax + structure + requirements.yaml specific rules
